title: EIB invests $58.7M into Comau’s Italian facilities
description:
Comau said the EIB partnership will target industrial sectors including batteries, aerospace, construction, renewable energy, and logistics.

The post EIB invests $58.7M into Comau’s Italian facilities appeared first on The Robot Report.
